SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.QC_ITEM_CD ,T1.QC_ITEM_NM ,T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE ,T1.QC_ITEM_DTLS ,(CASE WHEN T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'A' THEN '건축시설' WHEN T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'C' THEN '토목시설' WHEN T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'M' THEN '기계시설' WHEN T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'E' THEN '전기시설' WHEN T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'I' THEN '정보통신시설' END) AS FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.DEPTH_SORT) AS DEPTH_SORT ,T1.USE_YN FROM QC_ITEM_CD_F T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.QC_ITEM_CD LIKE #sQcItemCd# || '%'
AND T1.QC_ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcItemNm# || '%'
AND T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND T1.DEPTH_SORT = TO_NUMBER(#sDepthSort#)
ORDER BY T1.QC_ITEM_CD ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM QC_ITEM_CD_F WHERE 1=1
AND QC_ITEM_CD LIKE #sQcItemCd# || '%'
AND QC_ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcItemNm# || '%'
AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND DEPTH_SORT = TO_NUMBER(#sDepthSort#)
